title: Home Minister Amit Shah tested positive for COVID-19? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on social media claiming that Home Minister Amit Shah has been tested positive of Coronavirus.

Link to the above post.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

We ran a search and did not find any credible media reports to support the viral claim.

We found a video of the cabinet meeting held on March 25, 2020, where Home Minister Amit Shah was present.

Further investigation led us to a website called Break Your Own News, which was used to produce the above graphic.

The above information establishes that the viral post is FAKE.
